channel.title: am on Barefoot Rob
channel.description: Recent content in am on Barefoot Rob

item.title: mornin
item.description: This morning during meditation I realized I can do Meetups anywhere in the world. Why limit myself to just Tokyo? Why not lead an eye gazing workshop in Hawaii while I’m there? I am going to go for a walk; I wonder what time the local store opens. Probably 7am.

item.title: thirteenth walk, a week late
item.description: 07:46 Friday 07 September 2018 JST Walked this morning for the first time in a week or so oops. Good times, including meeting the guy who I usually meet on Wednesdays while he is on his exercise route. Oh, and nodded to the kid who runs around the neighborhood as well.

item.title: swapping A and P
item.description: 16:40 Saturday 30 December 2017 -02 We are going to get on the flight in several hours from now. I wonder when I will start to reverse my sleep schedule. We are 11 hours behind Tokyo, so not as far away as possible, but close. I have just gotten out my computer (to work on ConSwi) when I realized I should be sleeping.

item.title: before lesson
item.description: 07:38 Monday 05 June 2017 JST I feel a bit tired this morning, and am not too sure how I will present today’s material; it depends on how long the discussion of “What does it mean to be Japanese” goes. 07:51 Monday 05 June 2017 JST Egad I am falling asleep. Also, I just remembered this morning that I still have to test t.CB and m.CB and api.CB before making the new CB server handle live traffic.

item.title: AM rain
item.description: 07:50 Tuesday 09 June 2015 JST Funny how I’ve not worked on my journal infrastructure for a while. Lin just today asked why it takes me so lonngg to put the stuff back on my desk. I told her it’s cause I’m careful, but it’s also cause I’m lazy / busy with other junk. In the case of my website, it’s only because I’m busy with other junk. Yesterday I reinjured my elbow picking up Lin’s bicycle to carry over the train tracks on the way to meet Masa at noon in Lazona.
